_header: He that made heaven and earth sun and moon for to shine
Note: For the revised text in 8-line stanzas see 1881.
Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Katharine — in long monorhyming quatrains

NLS1921.First Lines:
He þat made made heuen & erþe & sonne & mone forto
                    schineBring ous in to his riche & scheld ous fram helle
                    pine…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Do now forþ þou fendes lim Of þe no am y nouȝt
                    agastFor al þat þou canst bi þinke Y wil suffre al in
                    hast
NLS1921.Note:
Written half line per line of MS; or 8-line stanzas, abcbdbeb; ends
                    imperfectly.
